trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: Accessibility

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Introduces accessibility concepts that relate to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
trans-unit.target: Introduces accessibility concepts that relate to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

trans-unit.source: Accessibility is about making your app usable by people who have limitations that prevent or impede the use of conventional user interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Accessibility is about making your app usable by people who have limitations that prevent or impede the use of conventional user interfaces.

trans-unit.source: For some situations, accessibility requirements are imposed by law.
trans-unit.target: For some situations, accessibility requirements are imposed by law.

trans-unit.source: However, it's a good idea to address accessibility issues regardless of legal requirements so that your apps have the largest possible audience.
trans-unit.target: However, it's a good idea to address accessibility issues regardless of legal requirements so that your apps have the largest possible audience.

trans-unit.source: There's also a Windows Store declaration regarding accessibility for your app.
trans-unit.target: There's also a Windows Store declaration regarding accessibility for your app.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Declaring the app as accessible is only relevant to the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Declaring the app as accessible is only relevant to the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: Article
trans-unit.target: Article

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: This article is an overview of the concepts and technologies related to accessibility scenarios for UWP apps.
trans-unit.target: This article is an overview of the concepts and technologies related to accessibility scenarios for UWP apps.

trans-unit.source: Basic accessibility info is often categorized into name, role, and value.
trans-unit.target: Basic accessibility info is often categorized into name, role, and value.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes code to help your app expose the basic information that assistive technologies need.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes code to help your app expose the basic information that assistive technologies need.

trans-unit.source: If your app does not provide good keyboard access, users who are blind or have mobility issues can have difficulty using your app or may not be able to use it at all.
trans-unit.target: If your app does not provide good keyboard access, users who are blind or have mobility issues can have difficulty using your app or may not be able to use it at all.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes best practices for accessibility of text in an app, by assuring that colors and backgrounds satisfy the necessary contrast ratio.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes best practices for accessibility of text in an app, by assuring that colors and backgrounds satisfy the necessary contrast ratio.

trans-unit.source: This topic also discusses the Microsoft UI Automation roles that text elements in a UWP app can have, and best practices for text in graphics.
trans-unit.target: This topic also discusses the Microsoft UI Automation roles that text elements in a UWP app can have, and best practices for text in graphics.

trans-unit.source: Describes the steps needed to ensure your UWP app is usable when a high-contrast theme is active.
trans-unit.target: Describes the steps needed to ensure your UWP app is usable when a high-contrast theme is active.

trans-unit.source: Lists the practices to avoid if you want to create an accessible UWP app.
trans-unit.target: Lists the practices to avoid if you want to create an accessible UWP app.

trans-unit.source: Testing procedures to follow to ensure that your UWP app is accessible.
trans-unit.target: Testing procedures to follow to ensure that your UWP app is accessible.

trans-unit.source: Describes the requirements for declaring your UWP app as accessible in the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Describes the requirements for declaring your UWP app as accessible in the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: Provides a checklist to help you ensure that your UWP app is accessible.
trans-unit.target: Provides a checklist to help you ensure that your UWP app is accessible.

trans-unit.source: Describes the concept of automation peers for UI Automation, and how you can provide automation support for your own custom UI class.
trans-unit.target: Describes the concept of automation peers for UI Automation, and how you can provide automation support for your own custom UI class.
